item.title: slock
item.description: slock documentation. Manual installation DEPRECATED: git clone https://github.com/a2n-s/slock ~/repos/slock cd ~/repos/slock git checkout main make clean install One can also refer to the GitHub repo. -------------------------------------------------------------------- Go back to the doc or the front page.
item.content:
slock documentation.

Manual installation DEPRECATED:

git clone https://github.com/a2n-s/slock ~/repos/slock
cd ~/repos/slock
git checkout main
make clean install

One can also refer to the GitHub repo.

--------------------------------------------------------------------

Go back to the doc or the front page.
